name.ja: エレメンタル・サーキュレーション

requirement.en: Reveal 1 Level 6 or 7 Warrior Type Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck to your opponent, and send 1 Warrior Type monster whose name is mentioned as material on it from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Draw 3 cards. Then, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard. If you do, you cannot activate monster effects until the end of this turn, except those of Warrior Type monsters.
